Prohibited packaging - Crate, Container, Insulated packaging, Carrying case, Trunk, Bag/sack, Jacket, Pallet, Sheeting
Prohibited packaging sealing- Strapping tape, Strap or coiled strip, Stapling and strapping, Nails and fastening, String
Extra fee applicable depending on packaging used
Tracking is accessible only at www.colissimo.fr

In the event of loss of a parcel handled by the La Poste information system, or in the event of despoilment of or damage to a parcel, and following an enquiry by customers services; or proof brought by the sender, the latter can request indemnification up to EUR 23/kg (including shipping costs), with a maximum indemnification of EUR 690, except in the case of misconduct by the sender or the recipient, force majeure, an inherent defect or any other factor which cannot be attributed to La Poste.
If delivery is not possible, your shipment will be made available free of charge in the nearest post office for a maximum of 15 days.
Delivery in letter box
EnvoiMoinsCher does not provide after sales services

Delivery to the recipient's address as from 03/26/2019 before 13:00 or in the early afternoon in rural areas.
Delivery time guaranteed: in case of a delivery delay, TNT undertakes to reimburse up to 30% of transport costs subject to certain conditions.
Security license-fee
Sign-on-receipt delivery or with business stamp
Online tracking possible

If TNT Express France's liability is incurred for any reason whatsoever and in any respect whatsoever, this liability shall be limited to compensation of the direct material harm resulting from the loss or damage, excluding any other damages or immaterial harm, within the following limits:
  • International road carriage: 8.33 SDR* per kg of damaged goods.
  • Air carriage: 17 SDR* per kg of damaged goods.
*value of SDR = EUR 1.12 as of 7 June 2007.

If the recipient is absent, the parcel will be delivered to the nearest Relais Colis ® pick-up point. The recipient will be informed by email or SMS. The parcel will be made available for collection for 10 days. Beyond this period, the parcel will be returned to the sender.

Delivery time guaranteed: reimbursement guaranteed in case of a delivery delay and The delivery time is not guaranteed in the following cases:
  • any article in metal or wood packaging;
  • any cylindrical article such as a barrel, container, paint pot or tyre which is not completely packaged in corrugated cardboad;
  • any package whose longest side measures more than 150 cm or second longest side measures more than 76 cm;
  • any parcel weighing more than 32 kg;
  • any parcel which forms part of a shipment for which the average weight per parcel is more than 32 kg and for which the weight per parcel is not specified on the shipment docket issued by one of the UPS automatic shipment systems;
  • in the event of force majeure and failure to respect the courier's general terms and conditions of sale.
Sign-on-receipt delivery or with business stamp
Online tracking possible
UPS's contractual liability is governed by and limited in accordance with applicable regulations (Warsaw Convention or CMR Convention, Montreal Convention)
